title: Embedded Software Dev.
Description: Developed software for sensing and actuation, and led embedded software developments for ultrasonics sensors.

title: Firmware Dev.
Description: Developed an unique shape detection algorithm, GUI debugging tools, and core firmware of ShadowSense (modular) touch screen for large scale video wall.

title: AR Software Dev.
Description: Worked on a state-of-the-art real-time AR project (HoloLens, UWP, OpenGL, OpenCV, C++)

title: Jack of all robots
Description: Currently working on cool exoskeletons for hospital rehabs for injured and disabled kids.

title: Robotics Engineer
Description: Built a Mars Rover robot. Specifically, worked on hardware design of science modules, firmware, and computer vision.

title: Team Lead
Description: Leading a 20-person team for an international autonomous robot racing competition for the year 2018 & 2019.
